meanings.definition: A person who advocates or supports separation, especially of a particular group or region.
meanings.sent1: The separatist wanted the group to split from the main organization.
meanings.sent2: The separatist group demanded independence for their region.
meanings.sent3: The separatist's idea of forming a new club for bird lovers was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her rebellious nature made her a separatist in the world of fashion.
meanings.sent5: The separatist's passion for division was unmatched.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of separatism or separatists.
meanings.sent1: The separatist movement gained momentum in the region.
meanings.sent2: The separatist ideology promoted division among the citizens.
meanings.sent3: The separatist fashion trend of mismatched socks became popular.
meanings.sent4: His separatist mindset set him apart from the rest of the group.
meanings.sent5: The separatist policies led to a fragmented society.
